text: Ana huteno ragine, hankavene maka ama mopafima mani'naza vahe'ma kegavama hania hihamu hankavea agrike ami'neanki'za, maka ama mopafima ru zamavufagane ru zamavufagane vahe'ma mani'ne'za, ru zamageru ru zamageru'ma neraza vahe'mo'za agri kege antahigahaze. Agrama kinima manino kegavama hania kumamo'a, mevava hanigeno mago zamo'a eri haviza osugahie.
